website_summaries.verdict: 10 drops a day is all you need, and the liquid form makes it easier to take.
pros: Trusted for quality and consumer safety
Absorbs more quickly and easily into your system than pills
OK for almost any diet (free of most additives)
cons: Some reports of a loose/missing seal and mold spores forming soon after receiving
Inspect before use and return if any issues

customer_reviews.title: Product molded after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to have mold growing in it after just a few months. I’m extremely disappointed with the quality. The use by date is still two years away.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: MOLD IN THE BOTTLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is disgusting, there’s mold inside the bottle!!! I noticed a black dot when I put a few drops in my water and got worried, I dumped the rest in a clear container and sure enough, MOLD!!! See pictures
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Draus

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect remedy. The results were almost immediate
customer_reviews.text: Got this hoping it would help with a serious hair loss problem. It was the perfect remedy. The results were almost immediate! After only 2 months, my hair has grown back almost completely. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading the recommendation from Anthony Williams, on his blog for colds and flu. I am so glad I did! For me it was nothing short of a miracle! I have been sick over a week w sore throat, bad earache, and laryngitis, did two droppers full into the back of my throat last night, and almost instantly felt it coating my throat and the pain subsided. It taste pretty bad but gave me so much relief, that it didn't matter. Woke up this morning feeling normal but just a little hoarse. A definite miracle in a bottle for me! Would give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. New

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for health issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of health issues I’ve been struggling with per advice of my doctor. Took it for a couple weeks and noticed I still wasn’t seeing improvement. Noticed one day black specks in the dropper, upon further inspection the bottle had MANY of these fuzzy black specks in it. This has set me back in trying to regain health. And the company won’t return my phone calls about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Toxic liquid
customer_reviews.text: Please, do not buy this product. This liquid Zink was contaminated with the mold !!! BLack Mold! At first I thought that it was a “special” formula with black granules, but after a couple of use I realized what I was in taking everyday. And I do not know how it’s going to impact my health, but I’m hoping for the best. I will definitely take it to Amazon headship and notify them about this harmful product!
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: Good product but I found contamination in mine.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a month now. Taste is little weird.. but I guess that's just how zinc taste... but today while using the dropper for dsaily dose.. I see a black particle in the dropper... freaked me out.. dont know if it is contamination or what...
customer_reviews.author: bhavish kondaveeti

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get any better than this.
customer_reviews.text: This is on the supplement list from the Medical Medium, Anthony William, as a very very good product if you need to take zinc. I've been really happy with it and I've reordered at least once and plan to keep doing so. To be clear, I don't speak for Anthony but he is not endorsing products when he puts them on his list, he is just helping us find a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Not confident in drinking this.
customer_reviews.text: While I'm waiting for an answer from the company I will not give more stars. I received the bottle this morning. I wanted to add the drops in my water bottle when I realized that two tiny black impurities are looking like seeds in it. So I decided to empty the bottle in a container to check everything. Some impurities look precisely like bread crumb; I cleaned the plate before empty the bottle in it, so what you see in the photo is exactly what was in the container. I'm not 100% confident in drinking this. The bottle was sealed despite that there was no packaging...
customer_reviews.author: Marie Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great immune system booster!
customer_reviews.text: I use this type of zinc as an immune booster for my kids. It works wonderfully. I put it in their juice and they do not notice it. Just make sure to take this after a meal or it could cause a tummy ache. Love this product and will be a lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Moldy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Opened up a brand new bottle to find mold in the dropper. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: my sleep has gotten better, didn't realize I would have this pleasant side ...
customer_reviews.text: I can notice a slight shifts within minutes of drinking this with water, so it is effective. After taking it, my sleep has gotten better, didn't realize I would have this pleasant side effect. I have been using this with Mitosynergy Advance cooper 1 supplement (highest recommendation) that increases ATP energy production by a factor of 10x. The cooper 1 by itself is awesome and this Ionic Zinc it just supercharges the effect.
customer_reviews.author: Greggson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes weird and it’s in plastic
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking liquid zinc for ages. This is the first time I’ve had it in a plastic bottle and it has a very strange after taste that myself and partner had previously never tasted with zinc. Is this because of the plastic bottle? I worry that there has been leaching and toxicity within the zinc and therefore we discontinued use and will stick to our regular glass bottle purchases.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bottle
customer_reviews.text: After Amazon has taken away the Eidon ionic zinc, I found this comparable brand. However, it really annoys me that these companies can't use a glass bottle! I try not to use plastic of any kind, especially when things are being stored long term such as supplements. I almost sent the product back. I'm trying to heal from chronic illness, I don't need more toxins to try to detox from. I would've gladly paid the difference for a glass bottle. Needless to say I guess I'll have to keep looking. For now, my husband is using instead since he is able to metabolize/eliminate toxins better than I.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Lady

customer_reviews.title: New batch taste disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Update: newest version I’ve bought, 9/4/19, taste horrible. And I can eat fresh Aloe gel and this new version is a 100% worse than that. I’m ordering from different places to see if I can get the old stuff while I look for a different brand to buy from now. The taste is almost like a bitter, burning salty taste. Unlike how it used to be which was almost metallic but not. I opened up three bottles and tried them all and they all were horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Abundantlyhappy

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Using this because it is recommended by Medical Medium and he only recommends high quality, effective products.
customer_reviews.author: Susan LaBillois

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was only half full and tasted watered down. Something was very off. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SWITCH AND BAIT
customer_reviews.text: NOTE THEY HAVE SWITCHED TO A SMALLER BOTTLE, IT DOESN'T EVEN LOOK LIKE THE ORIGINAL PRODUCT. SO, YOU GET LESS PRODUCT FOR THE SAME PRICE AND IT LOOKS NOTHING LIKE THE AD.
customer_reviews.author: DOUG

customer_reviews.title: ... the remainder for fear that it had somehow gone bad.
customer_reviews.text: After about 30 days (in the refrigerator) it became extremely bitter --if not disgusting-- and I had to dump out the remainder for fear that it had somehow gone bad.
customer_reviews.author: Erik & Leslie H

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the mold!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this every day for a few months now and I don't know how long there's been mold in there because I add it to black tea (because of the taste). I drank it with water today and noticed there was mold floating around. I checked the bottle and there's a lot at the bottom. I regret by this!!
customer_reviews.author: Marjy G

customer_reviews.title: not glass
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this product a few months ago and it's been really beneficial for my health. But when I had ordered it previously the bottle was glass. This time it was plastic. There is nothing healthy about medicine soaking in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Duclos

customer_reviews.title: Buy from DIRECT SITE and NOT Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I love this brand and their products but seriously spend the extra $2 and purchase from their actual website. I just received yet another bottle of my Zinc and the plastic seal is entirely loose - I could open and lift the dropped completely off and put back on and it looks completely untouched. A big no no! Who knows what could be in this, looks like water for all I know. Go to Good State actual website, just like their rep told me, they don't know what happens to their products what's amazon gets it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concerned about the seal.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item yesterday and it arrived very quickly. Upon opening the box to view the product i noticed the seal was somewhat loose. It wasn't broken but seems like it would be very easy to tamper with(not saying mine was) and no one would notice a thing. I'm skeptical about using is right now so I would like to know what steps I should take to put my concerns to rest.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Killings

customer_reviews.title: the lot # 1198-2-Ro211 has MOLD
customer_reviews.text: I'm seeing I'm not alone with that issue it is pretty sad to find out that the product you trust and consume molded.
customer_reviews.author: Arina

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to take zinc
customer_reviews.text: I really like the convenience of adding it to my morning smoothie. I figure it absorbs faster than a capsule would and I'm using it thanks to "Medical Medium".
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Mold!!
customer_reviews.text: I also found mold at the bottom of my bottle after a few months. I liked this product and thought it seemed to be helping my allergies, but it shouldn’t mold after a couple months. Now I’m concerned how long me and my son were taking it with mold in it:/
customer_reviews.author: loretta thomas

customer_reviews.title: Black Mold
customer_reviews.text: Yep, ordered in February and have been taking almost every day for past couple of months, getting to the bottom of bottle and sucking up black muck. Good State should discontinue this product and Amazon should stop selling it. Expiration is 10/2022
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Blake

customer_reviews.title: Mold? What is the black Stuff?
customer_reviews.text: I see I’m not the only one who had black mold or black spots in the dropper, I bought this bottle on Amazon a while ago and started using it and noticed the dots in the dropper. What is going on? What is this? I dumped the bottle out.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Best Zinc for me
customer_reviews.text: Best Zinc supplement I have tried and started to see results by observing healthier nails.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Broke Me Out
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this zinc broke me out. I'm dealing with rosacea and it made my skin worse. Maybe a detox effect? Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: A. Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Taste awful
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle and this one has a terrible taste! Not sure what's going on but I am done using this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. H. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: No flu this year!!!
customer_reviews.text: This should be in every medicine cabinet (and purse or pocket during flu season)!!! At 63 yo, I get sick easier and more often (flu 3 yrs in a row during the holidays) but not this year!!! I felt that body achiness, and headache I recognize so well as the onset of the flu, started taking this 4 times a day (and extra ester-c) and it knocked it out in 24 hrs! There's a lot of doses in that bottle too. WELL WORTH THE $$$!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients, a change needs to be made to avoid fuzzy mold in new bottles
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the ingredients and we have used this product before and it was fine. However, this new bottle has fuzzy mold in it. I learned to always check the new bottles of supplements. My friend had the same issue so I will be looking elsewhere for our next bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ark

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this products is it weekly you for the purpose of bringing up my zinc levels and birth bootsing my immune system. I would say it definitely does the job. It does come in a plastic bottle with a dropper not a glass bottle. That wasn't really a big deal for me at all. The Taste isn't the best but honestly it's a liquid zinc supplement I didn't expect it to taste like candy. I use it for myself and I give it to both my children. I have reached out to this company and I do trust this product for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Debonie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!! There is mold in this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware!! Mold!! Mold!! I have been giving this to my children not knowing there was mold in the bottom until today when I went to give my son his dose for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Richards

customer_reviews.title: This is an outstanding product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this zinc back in march.not one time did the company ask for a review of there product.i know why.they have an AWESOME product,and it speaks for itself!!!!!!!! after being on it a little over 3 months,I am seeing wonderful results!!!!my hair which was falling out has almost stopped.i feel good taking this product.i will DEFINITELY continue ordering from this upstanding company!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: murphy

customer_reviews.title: Barely has a taste to it. This is helping ...
customer_reviews.text: Barely has a taste to it. This is helping me tremendously to stay healthy while people are sick around me. I have been giving to family members as we are dealing with a stage 4 cancer family member and it has helped keep us healthy in this time of crisis!
customer_reviews.author: Kasie

customer_reviews.title: Bioavailable, Adjustable, Quality Zinc!
customer_reviews.text: I've used zinc tabs and my body responded well - really appreciate the liquid form of zinc: * immediately available * quantity control: my body actually does best with less than suggested, the products liquid form makes it simple to adjust. Absolutely, 100% recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shuree Olson

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after following medical Medium books and while it’s a decent product, I found others that seemed to work way better! It may work well for someone who isn’t severely zinc deficient!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Made me extremely tired.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really sure about this product. I took the recommended dose in A glass of water. I was in the bed a couple hours later and couldn’t get out for almost 15 hours. I was so tired and couldn’t really move too much. I *think* I’ll give it another try but with 1/4 the dose recommended. So odd.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Not a cold since I’ve been using it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this before and couldn’t believe it actually works. Not one single cold last year. Now I get it at Amazon. Just 10’drops a day. I’ve never gone one cold season without so much as a sniffle.
customer_reviews.author: Concrete Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Feeling good after a few days of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Woo! Feeling good after a few days of this stuff. It actually tasted sort of sweet to me - I think I must have been really deficient. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: A genXer

customer_reviews.title: Everything good just plastic container
customer_reviews.text: Everything good I just don’t understand why they will pack it in a plastic bottle rather than a glass bottle. It is very important for these to be in glass container. I really hope They change container if not I won’t buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in lightweight envelope with another product
customer_reviews.text: This liquid was shipped in an unlined or lightly lined envelope. The liquid did not leak, thank goodness, but could have if damaged in shipping. Very disappointed in poor shipping product.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Sobelle

customer_reviews.title: Superb Bottle of Zinc
customer_reviews.text: This bottle of liquid zinc arrived when I was in the midst of worst summer cold of my life. Like anything new I took it slow with first dose being half of label recommendations. Tasted awful but I could feel a change right after ingestion. Definitely need to take with a better tasting liquid as to get away from strange metallic taste. I can honestly say a couple of doses of this form of zinc got my body in gear to fight off this cold. Apparently this form of zinc is more readily available than other forms I have used. Definitely will be switching to this product.
customer_reviews.author: CritterCrazy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles didnt have a seal when I received it ...ordered 2... told the seller...it was replaced no questions asked....as for the potency and if it works... I cant speak for it helping with a cold etc...but zinc doesnt just boost your immune system ....it helps your eyes ..possibly helps regrow hair and helps your body produce testosterone... since I lift weights for me that is a real plus.... and I can say that it does work ...lets just say something ..has a mind of its own....
customer_reviews.author: bahughes1968

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but my last bottle was moldy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this zinc for years with no problem. Today a black mold spore came out of the dropper into my glass. I poured out the rest of the zinc into a glass and saw that there were a lot more mold spores. I had to throw away over half a bottle. I’m not very happy that I wasted my money and am worried about how long I’ve been consuming a moldy product
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Just received and it is damaged. The dropper was cut open so it leaked out. I had a book that was also shipped in the same package that thankfully is not damaged. I have ordered this product before and really like it. So hopefully I get a full refund so that I can reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived next day, which was so helpful. I’ve never used liquid zinc, and wasn’t sure what to expect. A friend suggested a starting point of half dosage (5 drops) to start, in either water or juice. I didn’t taste anything, nor was there an aftertaste. I had been feeling a little rundown prior to using, and very quickly I was feeling better. This is going to be a staple at our house from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Mom1Boys3

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using for roughy 2 weeks and I’m already reaping the benefits. I add 10-11 droplets into my water I drink in the morning on my commute to work. It was no distinct taste which is fine with me. My skin is glowing and I feel more energized. I’ll definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Watered down- funny taste
customer_reviews.text: I've never liked the taste of zinc and I expect it to taste bad. However, this recent bottle I received has a completely different taste than previous ones. This one tastes more watered down and it's not just me. My kids notice it too. I'm afraid I have a fake product and I just wasted my money. I need to find a better brand that I can trust. This company blames all their problems on "Amazon." That's the easy way out.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Infection be gone!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend. I now swear by it and spread the word every chance I get! My 12 y/o daughter’s throat was hurting. Gave her this product and the healing began! She missed one day of school and was back at it the next! I’ve used this myself with great results as well!
customer_reviews.author: cmelton

customer_reviews.title: Watch out! Black mold!
customer_reviews.text: This zinc did not help me with anything. Really disappointed to find mold all over the bottle when I was trying to take it. Scares me that it’s more than a half empty bottle and instead of zinc I was taking some black mold.
customer_reviews.author: Zully Wagar

customer_reviews.title: Great for immune support for any age.
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily as part of my immune support system. I'be been taking this for over a year now, am over 60 and have been healthy. Whether or not you believe about zinc and its properties, it has worked for me. The taste is a bit nasty but like a bitter water--however the benefits far outweigh that. If you get sick easily, this may be of great help for you. Just try it.
customer_reviews.author: C Klostermeier

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Good Results
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, 10 drops. No taste really that I can tell, but I mix this in with my breakfast smoothie. I thought I would run out sooner, but it has lasted pretty well! I have felt great and I think this product is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband while he was sick. He received it maybe a day or two after. He took it for 3 days and it immediately started to work. He was sick for maybe a week.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Mold in it
customer_reviews.text: Just went to take some ionic zinc and saw mold in the dropper and In the bottle. This is very concerning. Find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a homemade label
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a homemade label, and not to keen on the idea that it is in plastic. Probably a good product. It does say it is GMP certified.
customer_reviews.author: Bridey Aphrodite

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for immune boost!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Zinc after reading The reviews. It came fast! Zinc is number one for an unbeatable immune system and we needed to get this for our family. My 4 boys and my husband and I take the drops. 5 drops for children and 10 for adults. You can literally mix it with water or whatever you would like as it has NO TASTE! We will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Lewandowski991

customer_reviews.title: Good state ionic zinc serves me well as a preventative ...
customer_reviews.text: Good state ionic zinc serves me well as a preventative during this flu and cold season. I plan to take some with me on my next trip, to help prevent illness by keeping my immune system high. I like that it comes in a glass bottle. But because of the additional cost I bought it in a plastic bottle the last time because I'm using it daily.
customer_reviews.author: andrea hildreth

customer_reviews.title: Quality product you can trust!
customer_reviews.text: It tastes terrible in water, but it is a quality product. Definitely will purchase again. I am taking this supplement because I am a vegan. I read this is a necessity for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Maria Cascio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot of vitamins & supplements, was out of my zinc tablets & saw this..I love it! Wish I would’ve used this a long time ago. One less pill to take daily, it has no taste just put drops in my water 1st thing every am & good to go. Would definitely recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Surf Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family uses this. Great that you can just take a drop at a time for the kids. Not the best tasting but its doable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Price

customer_reviews.title: Mold in bottle
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this!!!!!! I noticed the reviews about the mold and checked my bottle. Sure enough it also had mold!! I went to return it but my return window is closed. Will order from Vimergy instead from now on!
customer_reviews.author: LKosky

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews first
customer_reviews.text: It is still early for me to pass judgement on this product as far as quality, but I can say I am disappointed in the company. I purchased this product in a glass container but when it arrived it was in a plastic container. There is a reason why we are willing to pay a little more for quality products. In this case I was duped. After receiving I read several reviews with the same concerns. This company will not last long doing business like this. Now I have to question the product quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Niva

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: A drop in your tongue and your set with your zinc for the day! Taste not so good, but it doesn't last long. Received quickly and exactly what I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Here's to good Health
customer_reviews.text: Not sure on how to comment. Zinc is zinc found that zinc is one of the needed minerals to build up an immune system to it's fullest strength. I like the drops added with copper and magnesium to Airborne.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: didn't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't taste good, it made me feel so sick, couldn't take it longer than for 4 days. Was feeling so nauseous.... I wish I can return it back..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stored in PTE bottle.
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a cheap solution of zinc sulfate. The container is plastic PTE.
customer_reviews.author: czaky

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: There is mold inside the bottle! Do not buy this product. Disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, full of mold!
customer_reviews.text: It says it’s good until 2022 and I just looked and it’s full of mold!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Better than the tablets
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to consume, I added to my lemon water. It helped me with sinuses. I find drops better than the tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality zinc product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality zinc! I try to do one dropperful per day since the Medical Medium states most people are zinc deficient. I do feel better with using this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Relief from allergies
customer_reviews.text: A big relief from allergies. We can see the difference with in days
customer_reviews.author: Hari

customer_reviews.title: thinking it works
customer_reviews.text: We, as a family of 4, have been taking this daily in our emergency vitamin c drinks. We have not gotten sick yet. And, we have all been directly exposed to covid more than once in these past months. I think the Zinc aids in our ability to stay healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Page

customer_reviews.title: No stomach upset
customer_reviews.text: Have never been able to take zinc tablets without stomach problems. This did the trick, so happy to have found this product.

customer_reviews.title: Strong booster for immune system.
customer_reviews.text: I got sorethroat, body aches and fever. Was sick i thought I had the virus, I was suffering for 2 days then I decided to take 1/2 dose of this. Knock off my fever in 2 hrs. Healthy for weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G

customer_reviews.title: Medical Medium approved
customer_reviews.text: Powerful zinc. I put this in my lemon water everyday! I'm on medical medium protocol and he recommends this stuff. I don't have a complaint about it but i always get the glass bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Do follow its dosage instructions as it can make you nauseated (especially without a meal). Few drops daily basis is all needed. I actually need to buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Deaf Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Visibly less breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Visibly diminished my breakouts. I’m really happy about my purchase and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: made me nauseous
customer_reviews.text: I took 10 drops in a cup of water, within 30 seconds I was nauseous. Tried again a few days later and happened again. For some reason makes me sick. Stopped using.
customer_reviews.author: c2rnoc

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son for acne. It really helped.
customer_reviews.author: ProfJP

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it works
customer_reviews.text: I put it in my coffee to kill the taste
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use no foul taste
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stuff especially when your starting to feel a little run down a couple drops of this for a day or two and I was as right as rain!! Definitely recommend! A bit on the expensive side. Tasteless and odourless.
customer_reviews.author: Shinali Patel

customer_reviews.title: Fight Covid19 with Zinc!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money however it tastes terrible. It's ok for me I'm used to taking supplements that taste weird but just something to be aware of for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it helped or not. I take it every night along with my multivitamin (a few drops in my orange juice) and figure I am only giving my body the good stuff. No taste.
customer_reviews.author: Nanea

customer_reviews.title: Metalic taste as expected.  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Take it during covid pandemic. Mix with fluids and sometimes directly to back if throat. Metalic taste which I enjoy as it gives me the feeling the thing works. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially when taken regularly. Our entire family loves it

customer_reviews.title: Essential supplement
customer_reviews.text: Zinc is an essential supplement almost everyone is deficient in zinc, taking it has made a noticeable improvement in my life.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! 10 drops in my water and so helpful for when I’m starting to feel a cold coming on

customer_reviews.title: looking forward to more great
customer_reviews.text: I think this helped me get over a cold a lot faster...looking forward to more great results
customer_reviews.author: victoria Barlage

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for prevention and fighting off onset of cold symptoms!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always taken zinc tablets when I felt cold or flu symptoms coming on. My family started using these drops for prevention before the flu season along with natural vitamin c spray and vitamin D drops. Everyone around us has been sick, but we haven’t caught anything. My immune system is weak and I’ve stayed healthy even through this plague. I also noticed my hair is healthier and stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: have already ordered more! super fast service, too...I am very pleased! My friend turned me onto this brand, and I am so glad he did!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.text: i was expecting the bottle to be glass not plactic

customer_reviews.text: This is convenient since its liquid and I just place 10 droplets in my water each morning and drink it!

customer_reviews.title: Avoid illness!
customer_reviews.text: I’m certain that this kept me from getting whatever the rest of my family had. It tastes disgusting but you won’t notice it in a smoothie.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Haven't noticed a huge difference. But will keep on hand especially in the trying times.

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up

product_meta.title: Good State - Ionic Liquid Zinc Ultra Concentrate
product_meta.description:
Good State Natural Ionic Liquid Zinc Ultra Concentrate - 1.6 Fl Oz Bottle (50 ml) (Ionized Zinc Sulfate), 100 Servings

Give your body the daily nourishment it needs with our dietary zinc supplement. The 30th element of the periodic table has been reduced to nano-sized in this formula to facilitate faster absorption at the cellular level. A little bit of this liquid goes a long way: 10 drops is equivalent to 15 mg of zinc, which is about how much zinc is suggested for adults per day.

These drops will provide daily support to your body by promoting immunity, metabolic functioning and more.

This Good State product comes in a BPA-free plastic bottle and includes a dropper. so you can easily travel with it and never have to go without the minerals your body needs.

Recommended Dosage:

Adults: Mix 10 drops once daily into a 12 oz cup of water or juice and drink. Use more if needed or as recommended by your health provider.

Children: Mix 5 drops once daily into an 8 oz cup of water or juice.

Main Ingredients: Zinc (from Zinc Sulfate)

Other Ingredients: Ultra Pure Water

This product does not contain sugars, soy, GMOs, dairy, gluten, starch, preservatives, animal by-products pr artificial flavors and colors. It is hypoallergenic and vegetarian-friendly.

Caution: Keep out of reach of children. Always speak to your physician before using any dietary supplement. Do not use if tamper-proof seal is broken or missing.

The Good State Way

All of our products have been formulated for optimal absorption. Good State products are manufactured in the USA in a FDA-inspected, GMPc facility. We test for heavy metals, microbes and other contaminants to ensure the products we sell are 100% safe.

Legal Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: YOUR BODY NEEDS ZINC: Zinc deficiency can adversely affect everything from the immune system to your body’s wound-healing and infection-fighting abilities. Only 10 drops of our supplement a day can help your body get what it needs to stay healthy.

HIGH ABSORPTION: The high bioavailability and charged ion nature of Good State trace minerals makes for quicker and better absorption by the body than pills. These liquid zinc drops enter your bloodstream within minutes after being ingested.

SUPERIOR TO PILLS: With this item, hard-to-swallow capsules will become a thing of the past. A tiny bit of this liquid goes a long way, which makes getting your recommended daily intake a breeze! All you need is 10 drops in water or juice once a day.

HIGHEST QUALITY: We take pride in bringing you only the best food-grade natural products. They are free of unessential additives, sugars, starch, artificial flavors, colors and preservatives. They are hypoallergenic and suitable for any diet.

THE GOOD STATE MISSION: Our goal is to make getting your daily minerals easy by providing you with only the best supplements. We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee, so if you're unhappy with your purchase, you can send it back for a full refund.
